body:
I guess it's rude to keep you guys all in the dark. Firstly, I'd like to say thank you so much to the staff team for giving me this wonderful opportunity for bringing me in! I've learned so much, like, no kidding. I've also met so many new, wonderful people that I will never forget. I guess the reason why I left would be because I'm starting to have a bunch of work piling up on me. It has nothing to do with any of the recent senior staff promotions. Really, it's about what else life has to offer for me right now. I just don't think that I will be able to commit as much time as I did in the past in the upcoming future. For the recently promoted, congratulations to you! Make me proud by bringing up the name of Avicus. 

Cheers, boys and girls.
body_tagged:

title: I ain't Moderator anymore.

replies.body:
Thank you Stormz for everything you've done, it'll be sad to see you go, but we all do, in the end.
Thanks for being part of the staff team and being an amazing person, we'll miss you for sure! ;)

Thanks for eveything Stormz! 
Enjoy retirement!
